posts.post_content:
Step one: equip [Pili-Pala](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pili-Pala) with [Paradise Mantle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Paradise Mantle)  
Step two: With a [Heartstone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Heartstone) acquire infinite mana of any color by tapping, untapping Pili-Pala.  
Step three: Sacrifice Boggart Forager to force opponent to shuffle their library.  
Step four: Using the infinite mana already acquired, equip [Order of Whiteclay](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Order of Whiteclay) with the paradise mantle and proceed to bring back Boggart Forager from your graveyard.  
Step five: Watch opponents face as they realize they will spend the rest of their life shuffling their deck.
posts.html:
Step one: equip Pili-Pala with Paradise Mantle
Step two: With a Heartstone acquire infinite mana of any color by tapping, untapping Pili-Pala.
Step three: Sacrifice Boggart Forager to force opponent to shuffle their library.
Step four: Using the infinite mana already acquired, equip Order of Whiteclay with the paradise mantle and proceed to bring back Boggart Forager from your graveyard.
Step five: Watch opponents face as they realize they will spend the rest of their life shuffling their deck.
